prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered seated meditation pose with hands resting on sacred geometry, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating octahedron, merkaba, flower of life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with elemental spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor CRPANIB's profile: 'He who destroys speech', Aethyr ZAA, Earth element, Tarot The High Priestess, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Cancer, embodying the essence: 'In CRPANIB's presence, even silence speaks volumes an unseen undercurrent passes through the hush, h...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions

profile_data.title: 'He who destroys speech'
profile_data.essence: In CRPANIB's presence, even silence speaks volumes an unseen undercurrent passes through the hush, hinting at guarded secrets and hidden intentions.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Silence of Secrets; guides oak-crowned guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A multifaceted obsidian crystal formation that appears simultaneously solid and translucent, representing the liminal space between silence and revelation. The structure embodies the earthen nature of CRPANIB, with sharp geometric edges that suggest precise boundaries of hidden knowledge.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Charcoal gray represents Earth's grounding energy, while silver-white channels lunar mysteries of Cancer and Yesod's transformative essence. The shifting pattern indicates the dynamic nature of concealed wisdom.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine structure, dimensional transitions, and cosmic information encoding
